reviewText: The dvd came scratched and the DVD case was cracked. Extremely disappointed in the overall quality of this product.
What can be said that hasn't already been said about this film? It's a classic! I really enjoy it and can feel for Clark. Definitely worth checking out!

I would have to say these movies are true 80's comedy classics. You can watch them over and over and never get tried of them. A family vacation that sometimes goes wrong with a typical family who just wants to have fun. These are both very enjoyable comedies that will be enjoyed for many generations to come.

I have seen these movies I don't even know how many times and still turn to them when I need some silly, crazy, fun movies.  I would say the occurrences in these movies are too silly for real life, but then....
